about_the_game:
Mindblowing novel patented computer vision algorithm enables you to shoot directly on the screen (using your cellphones and free app) and have ultimate fun with many of your friends divided in two teams - for duck hunting! (see instructions)
Competitive experience for anyone with an itchy trigger finger.
Get a free app for your cellphone - search for DuckHuntMO for either Android or iPhone. See the instructions slide below.
Super simple to use, absolutely no calibration – connect and shoot!
Learn to lead into a target and shoot it down before competition or teammates do! Similar to the original DuckHunt game only now in multiplayer mode with literally no limit on the number of players!
Play it on a large screen – the larger the better!
DEMO LIMITATION - only one bullet in the shotgun and slow reload. Full version 3 bullets and fast reload.

FEATURES

  • So far unseen application of the novel patented computer vision algorithm that enables seamless and accurate aiming with your cell phone pointed at the computer screen
  • Laser aim pointer in selected color!
  • Ultra simple connection of players’ cell phones through free Apps for both platforms (Android and iPhone). No hassle - ZERO CALIBRATION!
  • There is a version for Kidz of this game (also on Steam - DuckHunt Missouri - Kidz) – that uses paintball guns that splash paint creating crazy fun art effects in the game. No violence at all – shooting gallery with rubber ducks and clocks.
  • Great custom handmade graphics and animations

HOW TO PLAY

  • Playing on the large screen makes it more fun
  • Stand at a larger distance from the screen when playing - about 2 times the diagonal size of the screen - i.e. if the screen size is 65 inches play the game from 130 inch distance.
  • Avoid having cyan or bright white color around the screen on which the game is running.

INSTRUCTIONS

content_descriptors.notes: It includes shooting birds as in hunt.

Mindblowing novel patented computer vision algorithm enables you to shoot directly on the screen (using your cellphones and free app) and have ultimate fun with many of your friends divided in two teams - for duck hunting! (see instructions)
Competitive experience for anyone with an itchy trigger finger.
Get a free app for your cellphone - search for DuckHuntMO for either Android or iPhone. See the instructions slide below.
Super simple to use, absolutely no calibration – connect and shoot!
Learn to lead into a target and shoot it down before competition or teammates do! Similar to the original DuckHunt game only now in multiplayer mode with literally no limit on the number of players!
Play it on a large screen – the larger the better!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

name: DuckHunt - Missouri Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

short_description: Don't get fooled by the simple looks of this game! The way it is played is something unseen so far in the gaming world! Using a novel patented technology you and your friends will use your cellphones to aim at the screen and shoot! Show your friends who is a real gunslinger!
